title: The Interview
brief_description: An animated satire by Ernest Pintoff presenting an interview between a ‘square’ pseudo-intellectual announcer and a ‘hip’jazz musician. The announcer is utterly confused by the musician’s terminology, and the latter is utterly discouraged by the announcer’s ignorance.
